title: Boom! Announcing the 2017 Firecracker
itunes:title: Boom! Announcing the 2017 Firecracker
description:
It’s labor day weekend, and we celebrate from the beach at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Seabrook, New Hampshire. We will light up a cigar from 2015 that made its comeback. The La Flor Dominicana Firecracker has a year and a half of age…

In the second hour we will light up and unveil who will make the 2017 Firecracker.

All this and all the usual shenanigans on The Cigar Authority.
